hero.title: Woman Silentium
hero.quote: Beauty is born in silence; in the stillness is where a woman finally hears herself.

about.pageDescription: Learn about Dr. Venera Frolova and the Woman Silentium philosophy. Where science meets spirit in aesthetic cosmetology.
about.pageSubheading: Where beauty finds its voice in silence

drVenera.name: Dr. Venera Frolova
drVenera.title: Aesthetic Cosmetologist MD
drVenera.story: I believe that a woman's true beauty is born in her silence; in her stillness. When she finds this inner peace, she can finally hear herself; her breath, her heartbeat, and her truth — her true beauty — when all comparison fades away, haste dissolves, and borrowed standards fall away.

silentium.tagline: A sanctuary where science meets spirit
silentium.philosophy: We are more than just a beauty clinic — this is a sanctuary where science meets the spirit, where each treatment is a sacred ritual of care. We believe that true beauty is more than skin deep: it shines from within a pure and peaceful soul.

contact.pageSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out for a consultation or any questions.
contact.ctaSubheading: Book a consultation to discover how we can help you feel your most confident self.

services.pageDescription: Discover our range of aesthetic treatments. From anti-aging injectables to skin rejuvenation, find the perfect treatment for your needs.
services.heading: Our Services
services.subheading: Treatments designed to enhance your natural beauty
services.homeSubheading: A curated selection of services to restore your natural radiance

testimonials.heading: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subheading: Real experiences from our valued clients

form.name: Your Name

form.bookingSuccess: Thank you! Your booking request has been received. We will confirm your appointment shortly.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us directly via WhatsApp.
form.whatsappFollowUp: Or message us directly on WhatsApp for faster response

booking.title: Request a Consultation
booking.subtitle: Book your personalized aesthetic consultation
booking.success: Thank you! Your booking request has been received. Dr. Venera will contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.notesPlaceholder: Tell us about your concerns or what you'd like to achieve...

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Let us help you find your way back.

general.title: Something Went Wrong
general.description: We're sorry, but something unexpected happened. Please try again or contact us if the problem persists.

offline.title: You're Offline
offline.description: Please check your internet connection and try again.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Woman Silentium, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website or use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:

items.name: Your name when you fill out our contact or booking forms
items.email: Your email address for communication purposes
items.phone: Your phone number for appointment confirmations
items.message: Any additional information you choose to share with us

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.description: We use the information we collect to:

items.respond: Respond to your inquiries and requests
items.service: Provide you with excellent customer service
items.updates: Send you important updates about your appointments

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. Your data is stored securely and we do not share it with third parties except as necessary to provide our services or as required by law.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.description: We may use third-party services such as WhatsApp and email providers to communicate with you. These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them.

items.access: Access the personal information we hold about you
items.correction: Request correction of any inaccurate information
items.deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
items.withdraw: Withdraw your consent at any time

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Woman Silentium. By accessing our website and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using our website or booking our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Woman Silentium provides aesthetic cosmetology services. Please note:

items.consultation: All treatments require an initial consultation
items.medical: Results may vary based on individual factors
items.results: We do not guarantee specific results from any treatment

appointments.title: Appointments & Cancellations
appointments.description: To ensure the best service for all our clients:

items.cancellation: Please provide at least 24 hours notice for cancellations
items.noshow: No-shows may affect future booking privileges
items.rescheduling: Rescheduling is available subject to availability

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Payment terms and accepted methods will be discussed during your consultation. Prices are subject to change without notice.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Woman Silentium shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.

medical.title: Medical Disclaimer
medical.description: Our services are provided by qualified medical professionals. However, individual results may vary, and treatments carry inherent risks which will be discussed during consultation.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us.
